assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Writing and defence of the Master's Thesis.

objectives.en: The goal of master's thesis is to give an opportunity for students to gain necessary experience in research work together with reporting and presentation skills, by solving a theoretical or practical problem under guidance.
objectives.et: Magistritöö (30 EAP) eesmärk on anda üliõpilasele uurimistöö ja selle tulemuste kirjaliku vormistamise ning suulise ettekandmise kogemus teoreetilise või praktilise probleemi lahendamise kaudu.
